title: Hannah Montana: The Essential Guide
description: Miley Stewart is a normal kid, but her alter ego, Hannah Montana, is a young pop star who travels the world and performs to sold-out crowds. While Miley loves the dual life she's got, how long can she keep it a secret from the rest of the students at Seaview High School?Learn everything about Miley Stewart, her song-writing manager dad, her sort-of-cool older brother Jackson, her best buds Lilly and Oliver, and what it's like to live a double life. See stills from the show, get behind-the-scenes info, and find out how Miley/Hannah gets the best of both worlds!(c) Disney
author: Beth Landis Hester
